settings.title: Under the Weather Cares
settings.content: At Under the Weather®, our mission is to create memorable outdoor experiences with our weatherproof portable pop-up Pods. We believe everyone deserves a safe space that’s comfortable, accessible and inviting, whether they’re living alone, as a family or as a community. We also believe in the importance of giving back to the community which supports us.

settings.contact_heading: Easy ways to get in touch
settings.contact_content:
Include a contact form section right on your home page, to make it easy for your shoppers to reach you. You can control the position and alignment of the form and text, and you can also include links within your text. Some of the info you might want to include are your store hours, location and the various ways that people can reach you:

• Send us an email
• Give us a call at 1-800-ZEN-YOGA
• Read more on our Contact page

settings.title: Gil Sadri

settings.title: Say Hello to the Pod Squad
settings.text: Here at Under the Weather®, it’s all about the Pod experience. And that begins with the UTW Pod Specialists. They live, eat and breathe pop-up Pods, from the front office to the warehouse, from concept to production to getting the word out–they work tirelessly to deliver superior Pod products and high-quality service to customers everywhere. So, it’s no wonder they’re considered part of the family, and our loyal Pod owners a part of the extended family, known as the PodSquad™. And, thanks to both the team and the PodSquad™, our company is growing and thriving. In less than a decade Under the Weather® is the leading personal pop-up Pod in the U.S. with multiple patents and distribution in Canada, Australia, and Europe. And, as they say, the rest is history.

settings.caption: 360° Protection. 24/7 Comfort. 100+ Styles & Colors. Zero Regrets.

settings.title: When I popped my UTW™ Pod up for the first time the wires seem twisted. Is there a way to fix this?
settings.subtitle: It is normal for the UTWPod™ to be a little stiff and the wires slightly bent from being packaged, stored and shipped. We recommend you open your Pod upon receipt, lay it flat, and make sure the wires lay flat. It is all right to step on them firmly to flatten them and, once popped up, do another quick check to ensure the wires are straight, straightening them by hand if necessary.

settings.title: What do I do if the zipper seems stiff and won’t zip easily the first time I use the Pod?
settings.subtitle: It is normal for a new UTWPod™ to be stiff and a little more difficult to zip and unzip. Pods “stretch out” slightly with use. If the zipper separates slightly when it is new, hold the Pod firmly and push the zipper up and down a few times. The zipper typically re-connects and with ongoing use, is completely functional.

settings.title: My plastic is very wrinkly?
settings.subtitle: Try setting your Pod up in the sun for a few hours. The heat from the sun can greatly reduce the wrinkles and also makes zipping easier.

settings.title: Can I use the Pod on a cement surface?
settings.subtitle: We discourage the use of the pop-up Pod on concrete or asphalt as friction can cause a tear in the floor. Pods with tears in the floor resulting from use on concrete or asphalt are not covered by our warranty.

settings.title: I can’t fold my pop-up Pod! Can you help?
settings.subtitle: Check out our folding videos for demonstrations on how to open and fold your pop-up WeatherPod™.

settings.title: How do I clean my pop-up Pod?
settings.subtitle: A soft cloth and warm soapy water can be used to clean your pop-up Pod.

settings.title: Can I put a heater in my pop-up Pod?
settings.subtitle: NO! This is a potential safety hazard. (You won’t need one, trust us!)

settings.title: Can I store my pop-up Pod in its case if it is wet?
settings.subtitle: Under the Weather® pop-up Pods can be folded and placed in case for a few hours after being exposed to wet conditions. If storing your pop-up Pod in it’s case for more than 24 hours, open the Pod and let it air out and dry thoroughly before returning it to it’s carry case for longer-term storage.

settings.title: What if my WeatherPod™ has dirty windows?
settings.subtitle: The plastic windows on a UTWPod™ are easily cleanable. Dampen a clean washcloth with water and gently wipe both sides of the windows. Then wipe the windows using a dry cloth to dry the windows and avoid streaks.

settings.title: Can I customize and/or put a logo on my pop-up WeatherPod™?
settings.subtitle: Yes, rooftops (sold separately) for pop-up WeatherPods™ can be customized with up to 20 letters/characters and are available in a variety of colors. Visit our SHOP for more details.

settings.title: Can I get a screen for the windows?
settings.subtitle: Our exclusive, pop-up screen insert, the MyPod™ Screen Insert, pops up in seconds and fits inside our pop-up Pod pop-up tents. It is a snug fit inside the MyPod™ but also fits inside the OriginalPod™ and XLPod™. The MyPodScreen™ is the perfect accessory when you also want protection from bugs and insects. SHOP HERE.

settings.title: Do you offer a pop-up Pod that accommodates a stroller or wheelchair?
settings.subtitle: The XLDeluxePod™ features a back door for easy stroller and wheelchair access. A sturdier wire frame allows for wheels to roll over the back door lip and wider, less tapered shape also comfortably fits our exclusive Under the Under the Weather® Bench. Please call us for more information: (513) 871-0400. Monday-Friday, 8:30am – 5:00pm ET.

settings.title: Can two chairs fit inside?
settings.subtitle: The MyPodDoubleX™ is designed for two people, inside measurements are 46” x 46”, and it perfectly fits our Under the Weather® Bench or two smaller soccer chairs. The ShadePod is also designed to fit two people. The MegaPod™ can fit up to four people and the MonsterMeshPod™ can fit up to six people.For more info, visit our SHOP.

settings.title: What colors are available for my pop-up Pod?
settings.subtitle: Colors are subject to additions and changes. Visit our SHOP for the most up-to-date color selection.

settings.title: Do you offer a discount for bulk/larger quantity orders?
settings.subtitle: We do not offer discounts for bulk orders; however, we can save you money on the shipping cost per WeatherPod™ if you ship several Pods to the same location. Contact support@undertheweatherpods.com.

settings.title: Do you sell to wholesalers?
settings.subtitle: We do not sell to wholesalers. We do offer free shipping on orders of 18 or more. Please contact us at support@undertheweatherpods.com for more detail.

settings.title: What if I purchase an Under the Weather® Pod somewhere else?
settings.subtitle:
Unfortunately, many popular brands have imitations, products which have a logo and look alike, but the quality is not comparable. Unless your UTWPod™ is purchased on our Under the Weather® website or at DICK’s Sporting Goods, Field & Stream, Scheels, or Walmart, chances are it is not ours and the quality will not be comparable. We do also sell on Amazon, but be sure to check that you are purchasing from our Under the Weather® store to guarantee quality and service. While unfortunate, we actively monitor and enforce our patents and trademarks. You know what they say, "If it sounds too good to be true, it probably is!" Be smart and help us protect our brand’s integrity by spreading the word!

Under the Weather® is not responsible for products purchased through any third-party retailers, distributors, or resellers. Products purchased through any third-party retailers, distributors, or resellers must be returned/exchanged directly through that company. All applicable return requests and warranty claims will follow policies according to the company that sold you the product. Customer support related such as return requests or warranty claims must be directed to the company that sold you the product.

UNDER THE WEATHER® WARRANTY AND RETURN POLICY DOES NOT APPLY TO PRODUCTS PURCHASED THROUGH ANY THIRD PARTY RETAILERS, DISTRIBUTORS, OR RESELLERS.

settings.title: Do you ship outside of the Continental U.S.?
settings.subtitle: We currently offer shipping to Canada and Australia/NZ only. For shipping to Canada, visit our Canadian store. For any other questions about shipping, contact us at support@undertheweatherpods.com.

settings.title: How long does it take to ship/receive my order?
settings.subtitle:
We ship orders Monday through Friday during normal business hours. Ground shipments are processed and shipped in 1-3 business days. Expedited orders placed after 2:00 PM (ET) will be processed the following business day. Holidays may affect processing schedule.

Saturday delivery is not guaranteed and subject to carrier availability. Please visit UPS.com for more information.Holidays may affect processing schedule.

Transit time depends on your location and we ship from our warehouse in Cincinnati, Ohio. Most shipments arrive within 2-5 business days.

settings.title: What is the warranty on my UTWPod™?
settings.subtitle:
All products purchased directly through Under the Weather® (UTW™) have a 90-day warranty against manufacturer defects. These warranties do not apply to any defect, failure, or damage caused by improper use such as folding and storage, or improper or inadequate maintenance and care. Under the Weather® will provide a return shipping label.

Items NOT covered under warranty include but are not limited to:
• Wire damage caused by improper folding
• Damage caused by use on pavement, asphalt, gravel, etc.
• Damage caused by improper storage
• Damage or odor caused by tobacco products
• Damage caused by pets
• Damage caused by heaters or open flames

Under the Weather® is not responsible for products purchased through any third party retailers, distributors, or resellers. Products purchased through any third-party retailers, distributors, or resellers must be returned/exchanged directly through that company. All applicable return requests and warranty claims will follow policies according to the company that sold you the product. Customer support related such as return requests or warranty claims must be directed to the company that sold you the product.

UNDER THE WEATHER WARRANTY AND RETURN POLICY DOES NOT APPLY TO PRODUCTS PURCHASED THROUGH ANY THIRD PARTY RETAILERS, DISTRIBUTORS, OR RESELLERS.

settings.title: What do I do if I have a warranty claim?
settings.subtitle: In order to submit a warranty claim request, please go to the Lookup Order Page. There you can enter submit a refund, exchange, or credit request, and check status of your request online.

settings.title: Can I return my pop-up Pod?
settings.subtitle:
Products may be returned or exchanged within 30 days of purchase. Products (including stakes and roofs) must be returned in the same condition in which they were received, be in the original carrying bag, and must include order number and/or proof of purchase. Customized items are not eligible for refund. Original shipping and handling charges will not be refunded.

In order to submit a refund request, please go to the Lookup Order Page. There you can enter submit a refund, exchange, or credit request, and check status of your request online.

settings.title: Does my Pod protect me from getting sick?
settings.subtitle:
While our Pods can provide a temporary barrier and some peace of mind, during uncertain times we do advise taking additional steps to sanitize your Pod, inside and out, after each use and avoid risk of viral infections.
• While you’re out and about in your Pod, continue to practice social distancing.
• Keep Pod zipped whenever possible. Wear face covers and gloves.
• Clean and disinfect all Pod surfaces, inside and out, immediately after each use.
• Apply disinfectants that contain alcohol, bleach or hydrogen peroxide. See CDC guidelines for details.
• Avoid touching your face and wash your hands, or use sanitizer, immediately.

settings.title: Investing in our community-at-large is an essential part of Under the Weather's community outreach efforts and in supporting our loyal customers. How can you help?
settings.subtitle:
DONATION REQUEST GUIDELINES: The guidelines below detail Under the Weather's policies and procedures while reviewing requests for donations. While we attempt to accommodate as many requests as possible, please be aware we cannot guarantee that every donation request will be met. All requests will be reviewed and we will be in touch to let you know what, if anything, can be donated.

Requests submitted without 501 c3 status and/or a Tax ID number will not be considered.Organizations are limited to one request per year. We do not donate items as door prizes or to raise funds for operating expenses.Requests for donations may be sent to support@undertheweatherpods.com

settings.title: About Under the Weather
settings.subtitle: Under The Weather® was founded in 2010 when the founders invented the original pop-up WeatherPod™. Created by outdoor warriors for outdoor warriors, our Pods help you stay dry & comfortable when you’re outside—regardless of what the weather has in store for you. We’re dedicated to creating superior-quality Pods that are easy to use, and reliably protect you and your loved ones from the elements so you can live in the moment, come rain or shine.

settings.title: Our Founding Family
settings.text:
Rick and his wife Kelly are the driving force and thе family behind the Under the Weather brand. Together with their dedicated team of Pod specialists, they are driven to create innovative weather relief solutions that work every time, with proven results. 

It all started when Rick sketched the first WeatherPod on his way back from one of his kid’s soccer tournaments; he was growing tired of sitting on the sidelines at soccer games in 29-degree sleet, high winds, freezing cold, and soaked to the bone. He remembered many outdoor hikes and park visits when his children were young which were ruined by sudden downpours. He became obsessed with finding a solution—and so took on a trailblazing approach by inventing it. Rick has decades of senior experience in the textile industry, which when combined with Kelly’s managerial and marketing know-how, tireless perfectionism, and both their insatiable drive to always improve their products, makes them constantly invested in bringing best-in-class Pods to market, each and every time.

settings.custom_html:
Building A Product We Believe In

Built to Protect

Our Pods are durable, weather-resistant and will protect you from wind gusts, rain, snow, and the sun—even from nasty bug bites and germs! No matter the weather, you’ll be able to stay dry, comfortable, and be fully present.

Built to Be Mobile

Lightweight and super easy to pop open and fold down, you can take your Pod with you anywhere, wherever you need it: at the stadium, on the trail, on the beach, in the park, or at any outdoor event where weather protection is a must.

Built to Last

We engineer solutions that work no matter what—and work every time. We don’t compromise on quality and guarantee our Pods will last you a very long time by serving you faithfully in adverse weather conditions or on the job, wherever you choose to make unforgettable memories or need more comfort.

About Our Pods
As featured in

settings.title: Building Community - UTW Cares
settings.text:
INITIATIVE

Our community is what inspires us and helps us move forward—and we’re looking for every opportunity to give back to it.

We’ve created UTWCares™ to partner with local non-profit organizations who share our vision that everyone needs a safe and inviting environment to find peace, comfort, hope, and support. There are families in our communities who are struggling with varied kinds of hardship—illness, loss, uncertainty—and those who just need a helping hand. We believe that everyone should be able to find safety and comfort to heal and flourish. That’s why we created UTWCares where we provide the right conditions to those who need them most and help raise awareness for those who are fragile.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.subtitle: We built a brand we love so you can experience life unlimited with the ones that matter the most

settings.title: How We Got Started
settings.content:
We have been there from the beginning—side-by-side with other parents, sports fans, and outdoor warriors—sticking it out, no matter what. We know how important it is to show up and be there, regardless of the morning forecast, supporting your family at work or play. We also know that if you’re cold, wet, and miserable, those memorable moments and work days aren’t as magical as they should be. Our company was founded on finding a solution, one that was functional, durable, and easy to use. That’s how the idea for a pop-up WeatherPod was born. 

We worked tirelessly on it, built our design, tested it over and over, improved it, and finally created the first-ever WeatherPod™ in 2010. Over the years, we’ve created a vast collection of Pods because we’ve realized that each use case is different. Our Pods are used in all kinds of settings and for many different activities—we believe that everyone deserves on-the-spot comfort and weather relief. 

Our customers are our biggest supporters, and they have helped us shape who we are, what we design, and what we stand for. Since the beginning, they’re woven into our story—and we’re devoted to helping them be there for the people and events that matter the most.

settings.title: Founding Team
settings.content: Rick and Kelly are UTW’s creators and the driving force behind UTW’s growth success.

settings.title: Rick Pescovitz
settings.text: Rick is the inventor of the original WeatherPod™, which he designed in 2010. He is a perfectionist as he’s never satisfied with shortcuts or rushed solutions, and makes no compromises with the quality of UTW’s Pods. Having 30 years of experience in the textile industry has helped him take UTW to the next level—and he’s always looking for ways to improve and build better Pods.

settings.title: Kelly Mahan
settings.text: Kelly, Rick’s wife, is passionate about planning, managing, and maintaining order—which is a must in any business. Before devoting herself to UTW, she led a successful marketing firm. Drawing from her marketing experience, she has helped shape the UTW brand and manage the company’s growth plan. Rick and Kelly's three children, who are passionate about anything outdoors and sports-related, formed the inspiration behind UTW's Pods and continue to be an inspiration to their company's vision today.

settings.title: What is UTW Cares?
settings.text: UTWCares™ is an initiative that we created to partner with our customer community and non-profits who share our passion for building and maintaining safe and inviting environments where anyone in need can find comfort, hope, and support. We believe everyone should be safe and comfortable. We want everyone to enjoy the outdoors as we do, as well as create and share memorable moments with close friends and family. And we are always looking for ways to help others achieve this.

settings.title: Creating Impact
settings.text: With each step that we’re taking, UTW wants to create a positive impact. Supporting local communities in overcoming the effects of natural disasters by providing aid and shelter, spreading awareness of rare medical conditions, creating a safe haven for the homeless, and overall reaching out to those in need—those are some of the key missions we’re passionately engaged with and not to mention, that we deeply care about.

settings.title: Giving With Purpose
settings.text: Giving back to our community is one of our highest priorities. If you know a charity who could use our help, who shares our goals and missions, please let us know.  Every cause we choose to support reflects a mission that is highly valuable and important to our team. We’re partnering with different local and national organizations which help transform the world and the lives of others.

settings.title: Company
settings.subtitle: Overview

settings.title: About UTW
settings.text: Under the Weather® was founded in 2010 when we invented the first, original pop-up WeatherPod™. Ever since, we’ve been designing new, innovative, and durable Pods, built to shield our customers from just about any kind of weather, as well as germs, pesky insects and more! We’re sports enthusiasts, outdoor warriors ourselves, parents, and professionals of all kinds—so we know exactly what you need. Our Pods will help you stay dry and comfortable so that you can be fully present in the moment, focusing on the life experiences that matter.

settings.title: What We Stand For
settings.text: We’re uncompromising with material quality and precision of our Pod designs. Our team of Pod specialists always aims to provide you with unmatched customer care that doesn’t end with your purchase. We’re devoted to helping everyone stay safe and enjoy the magic of the outdoors. We’re also dedicated to investing in the communities which have brought our brand its current success.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: We don’t imitate—we innovate. UTW provides the highest quality of weatherproof Pods on the market and we guarantee that they will be the ideal defense from the elements so you can do more of what you love. We’re dedicated to designing dynamic solutions that are practical, durable, and easy to use—not to mention can be used by anyone, anytime, anywhere.

settings.title: Bring Out
settings.subtitle: The Adventure in you

settings.content:
Our extensive collection of Pods are designed to put your safety and comfort first, no matter the conditions. Patented and proven, our pop-up tents will outperform any imitation out there. That's our mission: To keep you protected, present and in the moment on the field, on the trail or on the job.

Need your Pod today? Find a DICK's Sporting Goods store nearby that sells our WeatherPod™ tents.

settings.title: Professional-Grade Protection
settings.subtitle: The WalkingPod™ Pro. Designed to keep you moving through the toughest conditions.

settings.title: Customer Testimonial
settings.testimonial: 9 years of watching the boys play baseball in this crazy Texas weather. 🥶 Finally bought an Under The Weather Pod. BEST purchase ever! #boymom #craxytxtemps #undertheweather #MyPodDoubleX
settings.name: Andrea K.

settings.title: Customer Testimonial
settings.testimonial: I have owned my pod for over 5 years. I just bought the stadium pod & it is perfect for sitting in the bleachers.

settings.title: Ultimate Gear for Outdoor Warriors
settings.subtitle: Outdoors warriors are our tribe - and we're dedicated to making it easy to stay dry, comfortable & protected in all conditions of weather.
